comment._content: Um ok, there are boats in the Air and Space collection... Do they go under the Air or Space part?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/66151649@N02] Surprisingly, many of the ships in our collection do have an Air or Space connection.  For example this Cruiser had a catapult which could launch an airplanes.
